home.description: Having accumulated over four years of experience in designing, developing, and maintaining websites, online systems, and mobile applications, I have worked with a wide range of technologies. My versatility has enabled me to tackle projects across various platforms and environments, always striving to provide high-quality and high-performance solutions.

about.title: ABOUT
about.description: With a diverse professional background as an employee and freelancer, I have gained a comprehensive understanding of the industry and the ability to adapt to different teams and projects. My results-oriented approach and passion for learning have allowed me to stand out in my career and contribute to successful projects. As a computer engineer, I always strived to excel in my programming classes, and my determination is reflected in the quality of my work and the satisfaction of my clients.
